text.autoconfig.LibertyVillagers.title: Liberty Villagers Config
Find POI Range
The Euclidean Distance a villager will search for a bed, bell, or workplace. Mojang default: 48. Suggested default: 128.
Pathfinding Max Range
The maximum Manhattan Distance allowed for a valid villager path. Mojang default: 100. Suggested default: 256.
Find Crop Range
The number of blocks a farmer will search for a mature crop or empty farmland in the x/z plane (expensive). Mojang default: 1. Suggested default: 10
Heal Villager On Wake
Heals a villager to max health upon waking from sleep.
Plant Same Crop
When harvesting a crop, farmers will attempt to plant the same crop if they have the right seeds.
Golems Avoid Cactus
Raises the danger level of walking near a cactus in the Golem's pathfinding AI.
Villagers Avoid Cactus
Raises the danger level of walking near a cactus in the Villagers's pathfinding AI.
Villagers Don't Climb
Prevents villagers from being pushed onto ladders, vines, etc.
Armorers Heal Iron Golems
During their working hours, armorers will seek out and heal nearby Iron Golems.
Armorers Heal Iron Golems Range
The Euclidean Distance an armorer will seek out Iron Golems to heal.
